hero.title: VeloFlux LB
hero.description: Intelligent container-native global load balancer with {{highlight}} capabilities, SSL termination, HTTP/3 support, predictive analytics, and automated optimization. Built for the cloud-native era.

ai.title: Intelligent Load Balancing
ai.description: Advanced AI and machine learning capabilities for automated optimization and predictive performance

aiPoweredRouting.title: AI-Powered Routing
aiPoweredRouting.description: Machine learning algorithms automatically select optimal backends based on real-time performance metrics and predictive analytics

predictiveAnalytics.title: Predictive Analytics
predictiveAnalytics.description: AI-driven traffic forecasting and capacity planning with early spike detection and automated scaling recommendations

anomalyDetection.title: Anomaly Detection
anomalyDetection.description: Real-time detection of unusual patterns, performance anomalies, and potential security threats using advanced ML models

performanceOptimization.title: Performance Optimization
performanceOptimization.description: AI-generated configuration recommendations and automated tuning for optimal load balancing performance

core.title: Enterprise-Grade Features
core.description: Built from the ground up for modern cloud infrastructure with production-tested reliability

sslTermination.title: SSL/TLS Termination
sslTermination.description: Automatic ACME certificates with Let's Encrypt, HTTP/2 & HTTP/3 support, SNI routing

healthMonitoring.title: Health Monitoring
healthMonitoring.description: Active HTTP/TCP health checks, passive failure detection, exponential backoff retry

geoAwareRouting.title: Geo-Aware Routing
geoAwareRouting.description: Route traffic to nearest healthy backend using MaxMind GeoIP, anycast support

loadBalancing.title: Load Balancing
loadBalancing.description: Round-robin, least-connections, IP-hash, weighted backends with sticky sessions

protocolSupport.title: Protocol Support
protocolSupport.description: WebSocket pass-through, gRPC proxying, HTTP/1.1, HTTP/2, HTTP/3 (QUIC)

securityFeatures.title: Security Features
securityFeatures.description: Rate limiting, WAF integration hooks, mTLS upstream, IP allowlisting

highPerformance.title: High Performance
highPerformance.description: Handle 100k+ concurrent connections on 2 vCPU, optimized for cloud workloads

cloudNative.title: Cloud Native
cloudNative.description: Docker native, stateless design, Kubernetes ready, horizontal scaling

aiShowcase.title: AI That Actually {{highlight}}
aiShowcase.description: Experience the future of load balancing with AI that learns, predicts, and optimizes your infrastructure automatically

intelligentRouting.title: Intelligent Routing
intelligentRouting.description: ML algorithms analyze real-time performance metrics to automatically route traffic to the optimal backend

predictiveScaling.title: Predictive Scaling
predictiveScaling.description: AI forecasts traffic patterns and recommends scaling actions before demand spikes occur

anomalyDetection.title: Anomaly Detection
anomalyDetection.description: Real-time pattern recognition identifies unusual behavior and potential security threats

autoOptimization.title: Auto-Optimization
autoOptimization.description: Continuous AI analysis provides configuration recommendations for optimal performance

demo.title: See AI in Action
demo.description: Experience real-time AI decision making with our interactive dashboard. Watch as machine learning algorithms optimize your traffic routing in real-time.

performance.title: Performance Benchmarks
performance.description: Real-world performance metrics comparing traditional load balancing vs AI-enhanced routing

resourceEfficiency.title: Resource Efficiency
resourceEfficiency.testInfo: Tested on DigitalOcean Premium Intel droplet (2 vCPU, 2GB RAM)
resourceEfficiency.badge: Efficient resource utilization with room for growth

footer.title: Ready to Deploy VeloFlux LB?
footer.description: Join thousands of developers building reliable, AI-powered infrastructure
